item.title: Exploring Module Linkage in C++20
item.description: C++20 introduced the idea of module linkage, but it seems to be somewhat inconsistently implemented.

item.title: Compiling C++20 Modules with clang and MSVC
item.description: Command lines for compiling and using C++20 modules from both clang and MSVC.
